stages.value:
This game is a choose your own adventure story.
So, the story will have multiple endings.
As you progress, you'll find choices at certain stages.
Every choice will lead you to a different ending.

So...
Are you ready to play the game?

You are in a jungle.
There are two roads in front of you.
Which one would you choose?

Look around. See there's a rare footprint on the ground.
Here comes a tiger from the bush. He attacks on you. And you die.
The End.

You seem like a reserved person to me. Anyway. Keep walking.
There is a nicely made pavement in front of you.
You keep walking. You saw the exit and you walk out of the jungle. You live to live another day.
The End.
